A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a fan of Star Wars from the very beginning\, i found the magic to be missing from The Last Jedi.  I was impressed with\, and thoroughly enjoyed The Force Awakens and Rogue One\, but this one just misses the mark.  Bring back J.J. Abrams before Rian Johnson does the same thing with Star Wars that Lucas did to the prequels.
